destinations.name: Lalibela, Ethiopia
destinations.description: Home to 11 medieval monolithic rock-hewn churches, Lalibela is Ethiopia's Jerusalem and a place of pilgrimage for Orthodox Christians.

destinations.name: Simien Mountains, Ethiopia
destinations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site with dramatic mountain scenery, deep valleys, and rare wildlife including the Gelada baboon and Walia ibex.

destinations.name: Danakil Depression, Ethiopia
destinations.description: One of the hottest places on Earth with otherworldly landscapes featuring colorful sulfur springs, salt lakes, and active volcanoes.

packages.name: Ethiopian Historical Route
packages.description: Explore Ethiopia's rich history through its ancient churches, castles, and historical sites.

packages.name: Ethiopian Nature & Wildlife
packages.description: Discover Ethiopia's incredible biodiversity and stunning landscapes.

uniqueFeatures: Home to 9 UNESCO World Heritage sites

payment.deposit: 30% of total tour cost required at booking

faq.question: What is the best time to visit Ethiopia?
faq.answer: The best time to visit Ethiopia is during the dry season from October to March.

faq.question: Do I need a visa to visit Ethiopia?
faq.answer: Yes, most visitors need a visa to enter Ethiopia.
